meanings.definition: Small pieces of something, especially corn.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat niblets of corn with my dinner.
meanings.sent2: The salad was topped with crunchy niblets of corn.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel gathered niblets of corn to store for winter.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a rain of golden niblets, spreading joy everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The children enjoyed popping the niblets of corn between their fingers.

meanings.definition: A small pointed or projecting part.
meanings.sent1: Be careful not to prick yourself on the sharp niblets of the cactus.
meanings.sent2: The niblets of the broken glass were scattered on the floor.
meanings.sent3: The tiny niblets on the toy dinosaur made it look fierce.
meanings.sent4: His words were like little niblets, sticking in her mind long after he had spoken.
meanings.sent5: The niblets of light peeking through the curtains illuminated the room softly.
